response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, but we believe it could be even more beneficial to someone like you who appreciates its unique qualities. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This opportunity is not only about acquiring a high-quality item; it's about investing in something that could potentially enhance your life or business in ways we can only imagine. We trust that you will find immense value in this offering. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this product into your world.", "product_price": 12000}
